item.title: CVE-2021-25994|2024-08-03T20:19:19.566Z -- userfrosting -- userfrosting
item.description: In Userfrosting, versions v0.3.1 to v4.6.2 are vulnerable to Host Header Injection. By luring a victim application user to click on a link, an unauthenticated attacker can use the “forgot password” functionality to reset the victim’s password and successfully take over their account.
